segments.text: What do you know about our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , as I know this company is one of the largest and best in this field of business . It mainly produces toys for children . It employs more than 10,000 people throughout the world . The president now is Mr . Jackson . The Shanghai branch was founded five years ago with a staff of more than 2,000 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . If you enter this company , what department would you like to work in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I work in sales department ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Oh , how much do you make at your current job , if you don ’ t mind my asking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m paid 2,000 yuan per month plus some allowances and bonus as that come to about 3,000 yuan a month . How much will you pay me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the starting salary for a clerk in our company is 2,500 yuan monthly and after three months he would get a raise if his work is satisfactory .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any fringe benefits ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , we provide semi-annual bonus , a small bonus at Spring Festival , four weeks paid vacation a year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about insurance and full health insurance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can buy that for you .
segments.speaker: S1
